From: Robin Kirkman <robin@...>

On Wednesday 22 August 2001 14:28, gunthers@... wrote:
> yea thats fine....i was hoping to get him but oh well
>

You may well. Remember that VorbIss is rather suspicious of people. He's been 
invited to The Alliance, but it certainly isn't a sure thing that he will 
join them.

::VorbIss::

[Incoming Transmission:] chimed Iss to Vorb.
[
"Zorb and Iss, my anme is Phebus, the intellegence module of The 
Decepticons for Earths Demise, and or Domination's ship.  My 
leader requests a audience with you.  You will be a welcome 
addition to our ranks.  Follow these coordinates where we will have 
escorts to meet you"

Coordinates followed the transmission. They indicate a location on the tip of 
the continent known as 'India'] thought Iss.

Meanwhile, the shuttle was making more noise. As a precaution, VorbIss shut 
down all of his unnecessary systems to radiate less. It was not necessary to 
become a puddle and sink into the ground, but it would be advantageous if The 
Alliance came to him instead of vice versa.

As a beast-mode weasil, VorbIss climed a nearby tree, and perched in the 
upper branches, watchiung and waiting.
